description:
David Beckham has launched a new charitable fund in China to promote youth soccer and even made an appearance on the Chinese version of The Voice to spread the word.英国球星贝克汉姆在中国成立了一个新的慈善基金，帮助推广青少年足球。小贝还做客央视节目《开讲啦》发表演讲。

The former Manchester United winger hit the stage in Beijing to wow the crowd with a few kick-ups despite wearing shoes and a suit.这位前曼联俱乐部球员在北京登上舞台发表演讲，虽然西装革履但还是灵活地秀了几下球技，引来观众一片称赞。

Beckham has teamed up with the China Sooong Ching Ling Foundation to boost the profile of football amongst youngsters in China.贝克汉姆携手中国宋庆龄基金会，致力于提升足球在中国青少年中的形象。

He also delighted the audience by performing some of his famous soccer moves on air.演讲过程中，贝克汉姆还秀了一下自己的“贝式” 招牌动作，观众们也是看得非常开心。

title: 贝克汉姆做客《开讲啦》挺中国足球

description:
Emily VanCamp holds onto her International TV Actress award while attending the 2014 Glamour Women of the Year Awards After Party with her boyfriend Josh Bowman at Berkeley Square Gardens on Tuesday (June 3) in London, England.Emily VanCamp拿着国际电视女演员大奖参加了2014魅力女性奖的在伦敦伯克利广场花园举行的活动后排队，陪她一起的还有男友Josh Bowman。

The 28-year-old actress was joined at the ceremony by Editor’s Special Editor Award winner Taylor Schilling, Helen Mirren, Lake Bell, and Liberty Ross.除了她之外，当晚拿奖的还有特别编辑奖得主Taylor Schilling、Helen Mirren、Lake Bell和Liberty Ross。

“I love this dress – it’s different to anything I’ve worn before,” Emily shared about her Monique Lhuillier gown.Emily很满意当晚自己穿的Monique Lhuillier裙子：“我很喜欢这条裙子，它与众不同，我以前也穿过它。”
